episode_event_academy_academy01/8301_100:
Welcome to the main stage! DJ Vice here!
Lemme guess—you’re here for a battle, right?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8302_100:
I need to work harder to reach my seniors’ level!
Could we have a battle, please?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8303_100:
Having our Pokémon do battle is part of how we
learn about ’em!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8305_100:
A Pokémon battle, huh? Sounds good.
Let’s get started!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8306_100:
You can’t win with just knowledge. That’s what
makes Pokémon battles so deep!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8307_100:
Wow, didn’t expect to see you here! This is an
awesome opportunity! Would you battle with me?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8308_100:
You’re cool to battle me, right? I promise I’ll
play nice!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8309_100:
Oh... You want to battle? You’re giving off some
classic Nemona energy... What’s going on?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8310_100:
Up for a Pokémon battle, are you? Well, I suppose
I could show you the results of my studies.
episode_event_academy_academy01/8311_100:
I shall spare thee no mercy! Onward, then,
and go about thy preparations!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8312_100:
I’ve been off doing some super-serious training—
both in cooking and battling! Get a taste of this!
Arven’s here with some rich new flavor for you!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8313_100:
Why don’t we take a moment to share what we’ve
learned?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8314_100:
Did you come to train with me? All right, let’s get
our heads in the game and let the battle begin!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8315_100:
I came up with a brand-new battling style!
Would you battle with me?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8316_100:
Stop right there! Time for an impromptu check to
see if you’ve been studying enough!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8317_100:
Your mind as a Trainer is quite refined...
I’m curious what your grades are like!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8318_100:
Wanna have a Pokémon battle with me?
Let’s see who soars to victory!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8319_100: Show me your fiery passion for Pokémon!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8320_100:
I’ve been so relaxed, I’m afraid I may doze off...
Care for a Pokémon battle to help keep
me awake?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8321_100:
Whenever and wherever, dance, dance, dance!
You shall join me, yes?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8322_100:
As long as we’re alive, we should keep on
learning and training!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8323_100:
Let’s have an explosive Pokémon battle that erupts
with energy!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8324_100:
I have a question I must pose to you. Do you think
Pokémon battling can ever be worthy of being
called an art?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8325_100: Come on! Time for us to face the winds!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8326_100: Who’s more genuinely focused, you or me?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8327_100:
Sure seems like you understand Pokémon real
well. This is gonna be a doozy of a battle!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8328_100:
Hm? What’s up? If you ever want to battle or
need help fixing a machine, I’m your guy!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8329_100:
A-are you ready to take on the Battle Chatelaine
sisters?

If you manage to beat me, look for my sisters and
challenge them next!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8330_100:
I’ll put everything I have into treating you to the
loveliest battle you’ve ever known!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8331_100: You’re finally here! I got tired of waiting!

Come at me! Yes, the extent of your strength...
I will be weighing it in a moment!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8332_100:
Hello-how-are-ya? Are ya in good form?
I’m Nita!

Would you do me a favor? Of a bit of a match?
You will? Grand! Then let’s begin at once!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8333_100:
I’m doing some running exercises with my
Pokémon. Want to join?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8334_100:
*pant pant*
T-tired yet? I’m not losing to you, you know!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8335_100:
*pant pant*
Just one more lap to go! Let’s finish strong!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8336_100:
Wanna battle before class to prep?
Purely for learning—I swear!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8337_100:
It’s so wild that we ended up randomly attending
the same class at the same time! What a weird
coincidence...
episode_event_academy_academy01/8338_100:
Umm... I swear I’m not just sneaking ahead of you
so I can lie in wait and go, “Oh wow, weird,
might as well battle now that you’re here!”
episode_event_academy_academy01/8339_100:
Hehehe! I made it into Pasio Academy unnoticed!
Time to get to work...
episode_event_academy_academy01/8340_100:
Oh boy, what do I do now... The boss is gonna
be furious!
Ack! Not YOU again! Ugh, stop following me!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8341_100: Eeek! P-please! Just let me gooo!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8342_100:
Ah, perfect timing! Could you tell me the way to
the large lecture hall?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8343_100:
My apologies... I got lost again... This school feels
like a maze!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8344_100:
I made it here thanks to you! To show my
appreciation, how about we have an absolutely
champion time!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8345_100:
Come now...
Show me the fruits of your training.
episode_event_academy_academy01/8346_100:
Could I spar with you, given that you’re a skilled
sync pair?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8347_100:
The power you learned... I can feel it emanating
from you. I, Cynthia, accept your challenge!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8348_100:
Studying has taught us a lot more about our
Pokémon than we knew before!
Let’s recap what we’ve learned so far!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8349_100:
I want to be sure you walk away with a proper
understanding that cuteness is real strength!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8350_100:
Curiosity’s a must in the Survey Corps, so I’m
always on the lookout for new experiences!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8351_100:
If I’m gonna study at school, I reckon it’s fair to
want a few good marks, don’t y’think?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8352_100:
I wanted to ask you something...
What sort of things would you want to learn about
in my class?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8353_100:
We, three great friends, will challenge you to
a battle! Get ready!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8354_100: Don’t miss my epic live performance on Pasio!
Get ready! I’m gonna knock some sense outta ya!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8355_100:
Hey! How about taking a break and enjoying a
cup of our finest tea, made by us brothers?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8356_100: Hey! Looks like you’re enjoying school life!

Now, let me, Sina, and Dexio quickly assess your
knowledge!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8357_100:
We, Ingo and Emmet, will take you on as a
two-car train today!

Please check the departure time carefully when
riding with us! Thank you.
episode_event_academy_academy01/8358_100:
We’re itching for a battle! Is this your chance
encounter...or not?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8359_100:
The hated boss who beats you down, and beats
you down, and never lets up... Yeah. Big bad
Guzma is here!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8360_100:
We hikers climb mountains. Why do you climb
mountains?
episode_event_academy_academy01/8362_100:
Bwahahahaha! You dare challenge ME to a battle?
Fair enough—I’ll give you a reward if you
manage to win!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8364_100: Now you face the grand trial of the kahuna—me!

Get ready for your hardest exam yet at the
academy!
episode_event_academy_academy01/8365_100: Hey hey! Rika here, at your service!

Now, enough with the pleasantries! Let’s get to
the exam. Show me what you’ve got!
